instruction: Summarize the key points of President Obama's speech at the 2016 Democratic National Convention.
output: In his speech at the 2016 Democratic National Convention, President Obama highlighted the accomplishments of the two terms in office and made the case for continued progress by electing Hillary Clinton as president. He mentioned the increased job growth and advances in healthcare and financial security due to his policies and encouraged Americans to continue on a progressive path. He also urged citizens to come together, celebrate our diversity, and reject bigotry and discrimination. Lastly, he painted a vision of a brighter future by emphasizing the values of dignity, justice, and opportunity for all.
